name: Deadly Dungeon (KrishnaJawale)
description:
Deadly Dungeon is a short, simple, yet hard bullet hell game. Pick from three different supernatural abilities for your player, and use it during your quest to retrieve your brother's soul from the darkest and deadliest depths.

Will you earn back your brother's soul? Or will you fall to death?

For yourself, and your brother, failure is not an option.

Controls: WASD to move, Space bar to shoot Fire/Destroy nearby obstacles, Click to teleport

This game was made for the 35th GMC Game Jam, where the theme was SUPERNATURAL
